list.name: Status
list.query: select title,tags,text from annotations where $timeFilter and cluster = 'cinder'

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "cluster_name" = 'cinder' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^5/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'GET' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'POST' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'PUT' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'DELETE' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_check_api" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "service" = 'cinder-api' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^2/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^1/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^3/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^4/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^5/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "haproxy_backend_servers" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "backend" = 'cinder-api' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "haproxy_backend_servers" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "backend" = 'cinder-api' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "service" = 'scheduler' AND "state" = 'disabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "service" = 'scheduler' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "service" = 'scheduler' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT state, last(value) FROM "openstack_cinder_service" WHERE $timeFilter AND "environment_label" = '$environment'and service = 'scheduler' GROUP BY time($interval), hostname

SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "service" = 'scheduler' AND "state" = 'disabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "service" = 'volume' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "service" = 'volume' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT state, last(value) FROM "openstack_cinder_service" WHERE $timeFilter AND "environment_label" = '$environment'and service = 'volume' GROUP BY time($interval), hostname

SELECT state, last(value) FROM "openstack_cinder_service" WHERE $timeFilter AND "environment_label" = '$environment'and service = 'backup' GROUP BY time($interval), hostname
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "state" = 'available' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

list.name: environment
list.query: show tag values from cpu_idle with key = environment_label

list.name: server
list.query: show tag values from pacemaker_local_resource_active with key = hostname where environment_label = '$environment'
